lead_paragraph: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone underlined his faith in Fernando Torres on Friday in spite of his midweek sending-off but stopped short of saying the striker had a future at the club.

headline.print_headline: Torres' Atletico Future Unclear Despite Simeone Backing
headline.main: Torres' Atletico Future Unclear Despite Simeone Backing

snippet: Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone underlined his faith in Fernando Torres on Friday in spite of his midweek sending-off but stopped short of saying the striker had a future at the club....
